dailyQuotes.quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
dailyQuotes.author: Theodore Roethke

dailyQuotes.quote: Someday is not a day of the week.
dailyQuotes.author: Denise Brennan-Nelson

dailyQuotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
dailyQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

dailyQuotes.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
dailyQuotes.author: Napoleon Hill

dailyQuotes.quote: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
dailyQuotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

dailyQuotes.quote: You always pass failure on the way to success.
dailyQuotes.author: Mickey Rooney

dailyQuotes.quote: No one is perfect. That‚Äôs why pencils have erasers.
dailyQuotes.author: Wolfgang Riebe

dailyQuotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: A closed mind is like a closed book; just a block of wood.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Better to light a candle than to curse the darkness.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: He who cheats the earth will be cheated by the earth.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Nobody can make you feel inferior without your permission.
dailyQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

dailyQuotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
dailyQuotes.author: Mark Twain

dailyQuotes.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
dailyQuotes.author: Aristotle

dailyQuotes.quote: In the end, it‚Äôs not the years in your life that count. It‚Äôs the life in your years.
dailyQuotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
dailyQuotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
dailyQuotes.author: Lou Holtz

dailyQuotes.quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
dailyQuotes.author: Scott Hamilton

dailyQuotes.quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
dailyQuotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
dailyQuotes.author: Confucius

dailyQuotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
dailyQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

dailyQuotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
dailyQuotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

dailyQuotes.quote: Each person must live their life as a model for others.
dailyQuotes.author: Rosa Parks

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is not about how fast you run or how high you climb, but how well you bounce.
dailyQuotes.author: Vivian Komori

dailyQuotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
dailyQuotes.author: Buddha

dailyQuotes.quote: Don't find fault. Find a remedy.
dailyQuotes.author: Henry Ford

dailyQuotes.quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
dailyQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

dailyQuotes.quote: Winning is fun, but those moments that you can touch someone‚Äôs life in a very positive way are better.
dailyQuotes.author: Tim Howard

subtitles.createConnection: Send a connection request or invite someone to join Therr!
subtitles.whoInviteDisclaimer: Choose who and how you would like to invite.

labels.feedbackPlaceholder: Tell us what you love or hate about the app...

userProfile.siteDescription1: Welcome to Therr app. As we gather feedback and develop new features, let us know how we can improve the experience.
userProfile.siteDescription3: Content on the map is proximity activated. Share a moment with your connections on the map. Discover spaces nearby, and claim TherrCoins for actions (posting, reviewing, visiting, etc).
userProfile.siteDescription4: Then, check your feed for moments posted by others in the locales you travel to most often. Get to know the local culture by searching content that was shared nearby. Just tap anywhere on the map to start exploring.
userProfile.noActiveConnections: There are currently no active connections in your network
userProfile.requestRecommendation: Send a request to make connections and build a network

messages.error: An error occured while trying to send your feedback. Please try again later.
messages.success: Your feedback has been received. Thank you!

confirmModal.blockUser: Are you sure you want to block {userName}?
confirmModal.reportUser: Are you sure you want to report {userName}?
confirmModal.unconnect: Remove connection with {userName}? (You will no longer be able to activate new content from this user)

body.checkIn: Check in at a local business to earn rewards:
body.claimSpace: Spaces are public business locations. Claiming a space on the map allows you to declare location ownership, incentivize customer loyalty, and moderate content.
body.requestSpace: Request a public business space and earn points per request! We'll connect with the owner to add it to the map so they can start offering loyalty rewards.

shareLink.message: You can find this location on Therr App: https://www.therr.com/spaces/{spaceId}
shareLink.messageEvent: You can find this event on Therr App: https://www.therr.com/events/{momentId}
shareLink.messageMoment: You can find this moment on Therr App: https://www.therr.com/moments/{momentId}
shareLink.title: {spaceTitle} | Therr App

deleteAccountModal.deleteAccountMessage: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone.
deleteAccountModal.deactivateAccountMessage: Would you like to deactivate your account instead? Your profile and content will no longer be searchable, but you can reactivate your account at any time.
deleteAccountModal.confirmDelete: Please confirm that you would like to permanently delete your account. You will be logged out immediately and your account will be deleted.

infoModalPoints.description: Click 'Exchange' from the main menu to exchange coins for gift cards. In a future iteration of the app, coins will be exchangable for cash or cryptocurrency. Opt in to nearby notifications, and start earning coins through various activities like sharing a 'moment' at a participating business, inviting friends, and earning achievements. Or, opt out and enjoy the app ad-free!

touringModal.createAMoment: Press the GPS button on the map to start creating content. We require location for all posts to prevent fake users and focus on local-first interactions.
touringModal.createAMoment2: Too in the moment? Drop a pin and edit your post later.
touringModal.claimYourSpaces: Businesses and promoters can claim spaces on the map and offer rewards. Visit a space to earn rewards, then exchange coins/points for cash!
touringModal.claimYourSpaces2: Support local business and share the love.
touringModal.exploreTheWorld: Start discovering content by enabling location and walking around. Content nearby gets prioritized and activated. The 'Discovered' page shows all activated content.
touringModal.exploreTheWorld2: Let travel be your algorithm. You decide.
touringModal.findFriends: We'll send you invites to curated social activities each week! Wherever you go, get matched with the best hangout spots nearby and the friends with the most common interests.
touringModal.findFriends2: Find your vibe! Organize connections by 'close friends', 'family', 'acquaintances', etc.
touringModal.matchUp: Therr app matches you with current friends and potential new friends. We recommend curated social activities based on your interests and nearby restaurants/businesses.
touringModal.matchUp2: ‚ÄúCan't start a fire without a spark‚Äù

tips.create1: Click to toggle 'create actions'. These content types require geo-location to encourage local-first engagement.
tips.create2: A 'space' is a business such as a restaurant, and a 'moment' is for user generated content.
tips.connect: Invite friends, create or join groups, and view your connections list.
tips.discovered: Activated 'moments' show up in the discovered list along with global 'thoughts' and local events. Go here to post a thought or schedule events.
tips.gps: Press to enable location. This allows you to start activating local content. Discover local food, fun, and upcoming events.
tips.map: Tap anywhere on the map for a list of nearby spaces. Some spaces offer rewards for check-ins, posting a moment, leaving a review, etc.
tips.matchUp: Press the 'match up' button to generate social outings. We match you with nearby friends and suggest local spaces.
tips.menu: Open the menu to track your achievements and exchange points for cash rewards. Find other quicklinks like messages, drafts, and account settings.

accessFineLocation.title: Therr Mobile
accessFineLocation.message: Allow Therr to acces this device's location?

locationGps.description1: This app wants to change your device settings: Use GPS, Wi-Fi, and cell network for location
locationGps.description2: This app collects location data in the background to enable content discovery by proximity and to send related notifications. Location is required in the foreground to enable content posting and prevent location spoofing.

validations.mobilePhoneNumber: Input must be a valid, international mobile number beginning with '+'

labels.noBioYet: This user has not updated their bio yet.

text.noMedia: No media to display. Users can sync their socials to showcase their best content creations.
text.noMeMoments: No moments to display. You can create moments from the map.
text.noMoments: No moments to display. Travel where they travel to activate nearby moments.
text.noMeThoughts: No thoughts to display. You can create thoughts from the 'Discovered' page.
text.noThoughts: This user has not shared any thoughts yet.
